medical_history.chief_complaint: Constant, sharp right lower quadrant pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started at 1am and have been constant since then. The pain is not shifting and there is no pain in the back. Patient also reports nausea with vomiting twice. Regular bowel movement was noted in the morning. Denies fever but endorses chills in the emergency room.
medical_history.family_history: No early cardiac disease or colon cancer.
